# statistic

**Type Property**

The common name for the counter set that contains GPU workload statistics.

## Declaration

```swift
static let statistic: MTLCommonCounterSet
```

## Discussion

The statistics counter set contains the following counters:

- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounter/computeKernelInvocations]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounter/vertexInvocations]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounter/fragmentInvocations]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounter/fragmentsPassed]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounter/tessellationInputPatches]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounter/postTessellationVertexInvocations]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounter/clipperInvocations]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounter/clipperPrimitivesOut]

Use this name to check whether a GPU device supports the corresponding counter set (see [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/confirming-which-counters-and-counter-sets-a-gpu-supports]).

## Common counter set names

- **timestamp**: The common name for the counter set that contains the timestamp counter.
- **stageUtilization**: The common name for the counter set that contains hardware utilization measurements from various render stages.
